text: Mr. Wrong is a 1996 romantic comedy movie. The movie is about murder and marriage to the wrong person. Ellen DeGeneres plays Martha. Joan Cusack plays Inga. Joan Plowright plays Mrs. Crawford. Robert Goulet plays Braxton. Critics did not like this movie. It became a box office bomb. Category:1996 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies set in San Diego Category:Movies about stalking Category:Movies directed by Nick Castle
title: Mr. Wrong
